Check.description:
Lightweight schema validation for a Pebble checks.

Based on
https://canonical-pebble.readthedocs-hosted.com/en/latest/reference/layer-specification/
Check.title: Check

ExecCheck.description: Lightweight schema validation for a Pebble exec check.
ExecCheck.title: ExecCheck

HttpCheck.description: Lightweight schema validation for a Pebble HTTP check.
HttpCheck.title: HttpCheck

Platform.description:
A single platform entry in the platforms dictionary.

This model defines how a single value under the ``platforms`` key works for a project.
Platform.title: Platform

Service.description:
Lightweight schema validation for a Pebble service.

Based on
https://canonical-pebble.readthedocs-hosted.com/en/latest/reference/layer-specification/
Service.title: Service

TcpCheck.description: Lightweight schema validation for a Pebble TCP check.
TcpCheck.title: TcpCheck

permissions.description: The ownership and permission settings for a set of files in the part's prime directory.
permissions.title: Permissions

Permissions.description:
Description of the ownership and permission settings for a set of files.

A ``Permissions`` object specifies that a given pattern-like ``path`` should
be owned by ``owner`` with a given ``group``, and have the read/write/execute
bits defined by ``mode``.

Notes
-----
- ``path`` is optional and defaults to "everything";
- ``owner`` and ``group`` are optional if both are omitted - that is, if
  one of the pair is specified then both must be;
- ``mode`` is a string containing an integer in base 8. For example, "755",
  "0755" and "0o755" are all accepted and are the equivalent of calling
  ``chmod 755 ...``.

path.description: The file path, relative to the prime directory, being assigned permissions.
path.title: Path

owner.description: The numeric user ID (UID) of the desired owner on the host system.
owner.title: Owner

group.description: The numeric group (GID) of the desired owner group on the host system.
group.title: Group

mode.description: The numeric representation of the file's read, write, and execute permissions.
mode.title: Mode

Permissions.title: Permissions

name.description:
The name of the project. This is used when uploading, publishing, or installing.

The project name must consist only of lower-case ASCII letters (``a``-``z``), numerals
(``0``-``9``), and hyphens (``-``). It must contain at least one letter, not start or
end with a hyphen, and not contain two consecutive hyphens. The maximum length is 40
characters.
name.title: Project Name

anyOf.description: The version of the project, enclosed in quotation marks.
anyOf.title: version string

platforms.description: Determines which architectures the project builds and runs on.
platforms.title: Platforms

contact.description: The author's contact links and email addresses.
contact.title: Contact

issues.description: The links and email addresses for submitting issues, bugs, and feature requests.
issues.title: Issues

source-code.description: The links to the source code of the project.
source-code.title: Source-Code

license.description: The project's license as an SPDX expression
license.title: License

adopt-info.description: Selects a part to inherit metadata from.
adopt-info.title: Adopt-Info

parts.description: The self-contained software pieces needed to create the final artifact.
parts.title: Parts

package-repositories.description: The package repositories to use for build and stage packages.
package-repositories.title: Package-Repositories
